krrood.adapters.json_serializer.JSON_DICT_TYPE#
krrood.adapters.json_serializer.JSON_RETURN_TYPE#
class krrood.adapters.json_serializer.JSONSerializableTypeRegistry#

Singleton registry for custom serializers and deserializers.

Use this registry when you need to add custom JSON serialization/deserialization logic for a type where you cannot control its inheritance.

get_external_serializer(clazz: typing_extensions.Type) → typing_extensions.Type[ExternalClassJSONSerializer]#

Get the external serializer for the given class.

This returns the serializer of the closest superclass if no direct match is found.

Parameters:

clazz – The class to get the serializer for.

Returns:

The serializer class.

class krrood.adapters.json_serializer.SubclassJSONSerializer#

Class for automatic (de)serialization of subclasses using importlib.

Stores the fully qualified class name in type during serialization and imports that class during deserialization.

to_json() → typing_extensions.Dict[str, typing_extensions.Any]#
classmethod from_json(data: typing_extensions.Dict[str, typing_extensions.Any], **kwargs) → typing_extensions.Self#

Create the correct instanceof the subclass from a json dict.

Parameters:

  • data – The json dict

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to pass to the constructor of the subclass.

Returns:

The correct instance of the subclass

krrood.adapters.json_serializer.from_json(data: typing_extensions.Dict[str, typing_extensions.Any], **kwargs) → typing_extensions.Union[SubclassJSONSerializer, typing_extensions.Any]#

Deserialize a JSON dict to an object.

Parameters:

data – The JSON string

Returns:

The deserialized object

krrood.adapters.json_serializer.to_json(obj: typing_extensions.Union[SubclassJSONSerializer, typing_extensions.Any]) → JSON_RETURN_TYPE#

Serialize an object to a JSON dict.

Parameters:

obj – The object to convert to json

Returns:

The JSON string

krrood.adapters.json_serializer.T#
class krrood.adapters.json_serializer.ExternalClassJSONSerializer#

Bases: krrood.ormatic.dao.HasGeneric[T], abc.ABC

ABC for all added JSON de/serializers that are outside the control of your classes.

Create a new subclass of this class pointing to your original class whenever you can’t change its inheritance path to SubclassJSONSerializer.

classmethod to_json(obj: typing_extensions.Any) → typing_extensions.Dict[str, typing_extensions.Any]#

Convert an object to a JSON serializable dictionary.

Parameters:

obj – The object to convert.

Returns:

The JSON serializable dictionary.

classmethod from_json(data: typing_extensions.Dict[str, typing_extensions.Any], clazz: typing_extensions.Type[T], **kwargs) → typing_extensions.Any#

Create a class instance from a JSON serializable dictionary.

Parameters:

  • data – The JSON serializable dictionary.

  • clazz – The class type to instantiate.

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments for instantiation.

Returns:

The instantiated class object.
